response.overview: A young paratrooper named Miras returns from military service in search of his place in life. Fate brings him into contact with the “golden youth” - the children of powerful figures, whose luxurious and dangerous world is both alluring and frightening. A sudden incident at a country party draws Miras into a perilous game where lies and fear go hand in hand.
response.tagline: One must stay human every day
response.title: Охота на розового зайца
